sentences.en: a feasibility study on the proposed new airport
sentences.cn: 关于建议中新机场的可行性研究

sentences.en: At present, but its technical feasibility, to be further assessment and experimental.
sentences.cn: 但从目前其技术方案的可行性来看, 还有待进一步评估和实验.

sentences.en: But this is only at an early stage of feasibility study.
sentences.cn: 但是这仅仅处于可行性研究的初期阶段。

sentences.en: Confirms the feasibility of this method by an example.
sentences.cn: 并通过算例验证该方法的可行性.

sentences.en: Derek persuaded me of the feasibility of the idea.
sentences.cn: 德里克让我相信这个想法是可行的。

sentences.en: Engineering departments follow - or should follow - rigorous engineering Methods : That ensure the feasibility and quality of the technology.
sentences.cn: 工程部门遵从,或者说应该遵从严格的工程方法,从而确保工程的可行性和产品的质量.

sentences.en: Finally, the advantage, feasibility and correctness of this method are discussed.
sentences.cn: 最后论述了这种策略的优越性 、 可行性和正确性.

sentences.en: If you are planning any major changes in your business this year, you should also do a feasibility study.
sentences.cn: 如果计划在今年对你的事业做出任何重大的改变，你也应该做一些可行性研究。

sentences.en: In charge of the new business and projects and feasibility analysis.
sentences.cn: 负责新业务及新项目的可行性分析.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To discuss the feasibility of applying electronic prescriptions.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨实行电子处方的可行性.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the feasibility of spermatogonial stem cell allotransplantation.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究同种生精干细胞移植的可行性.

sentences.en: Objective To analyze the feasibility and indications of non - management for splenic trauma.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨 非 手术治疗脾外伤的可行性及其适应证.

sentences.en: Some of them doubted the feasibility of the proposal.
sentences.cn: 有些人怀疑这一提议的可行性.

sentences.en: Special emphasis is given to the consideration of economic and technological feasibility in a regulatory system.
sentences.cn: 对管理体系中的经济与技术可行性,本章给予特别的强调.

sentences.en: The economic feasibility of cost - reducing changes will always depend on sustained need.
sentences.cn: 产品成本降低变动的经济可行性,总是决定于对产品的继续需求情况.

sentences.en: The enormous difficulty makes him cynical about the feasibility of the idea.
sentences.cn: 由于困难很大,他对这个主意是否可行持怀疑态度.

sentences.en: The feasibility study report will be worked out soon.
sentences.cn: 正在编制项目可行性研究报告.

sentences.en: The foregoing paragraphs have focused on the feasibility of individual sources complying with emission limitations.
sentences.cn: 前部分集中在个别污染源遵守排放限制的可行性问题上.

sentences.en: We then know if the idea is worth taking on to the next stage which is the feasibility study.
sentences.cn: 这样我们就会知道这个想法是否值得进行到下一步，也就是可行性研究。

words.tran_cn: 可行的；可能的；可实行的

phrases.tran_cn: 可行性研究报告；可行性报告
